bibl.title: The Agricultural Economy of the Mendesian Nome under Roman Rule.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Land classification: What the agrarian terminology says. - 3. Taxes on what grows: The Mendesian fiscal terminology. - 4. A local sample: P. Oxy. XLIV, 3205. - 5. Conclusion: The Mendesian agricultural economy in context.

bibl.title: The Roman Agricultural Economy. Organization, Investment, and Production = Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.

bibl.seg: Katherine Blouin, The Agricultural Economy of the Mendesian Nome under Roman Rule.
Alan Bowman & Andrew Wilson (edd.), The Roman Agricultural Economy. Organization, Investment, and Production = Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy (Oxford, 2013) pp. 255-272, 3 tabl., 1 carte.

1. Introduction. - 2. Land classification: What the agrarian terminology says. - 3. Taxes on what grows: The Mendesian fiscal terminology. - 4. A local sample: P. Oxy. XLIV, 3205. - 5. Conclusion: The Mendesian agricultural economy in context.
